sentences.sContent: Which syllable does the stress of this word fall on?
sentences.sContent_eng: Which syllable does the stress of this word fall on?
sentences.sCn: 这个单词的重音是在哪个音节上?。

sentences.sContent: In syllabic languages each syllable has equal importance, and therefore equal time is needed.
sentences.sContent_eng: In syllabic languages each syllable has equal importance, and therefore equal time is needed.
sentences.sCn: 对这类语言来说，每个音节都同样重要，所以需要同样的时间。

sentences.sContent: Education! Science! Learn to read, is lit the torch. Every word of each syllable is launched Mars.
sentences.sContent_eng: Education! Science! Learn to read, is lit the torch. Every word of each syllable is launched Mars.
sentences.sCn: 教育！科学！学会读书，便是点燃火炬；每个字的每个音节都发射火星。——雨果。

remMethod.val: syll (音似： say) + able → 可以说出来的 → 音节

words.tran: 分成音节地；每音节地；藉著音节
划分音节；音节划分法（等于syllabification）
读出各个音节；使分成音节

trans.tranOther: a word or part of a word which contains a single vowel sound
